title: Could get into the wrong hands
comment: If someone got control of them then they could send people to sleep whenever they wanted

title: Used for wrong benefits
comment: If anyone can get it then it would mean people could use it to stay up for days on end partying, committing crimes, or other unbeneficial acts

title: Help students work better
comment: Student's often struggle with sleep schedules so being able to work during the day and sleep at night would be a good routine for them

title: Could prevent freedom if we're forced to have it
Social divides
comment: If only some people have them then there could be divides between those who do and don't

title: Help insomniacs
comment: For people who have trouble sleeping it would enable them to sleep and feel more energised.

title: Help with jobs
comment: If people work night shifts or long shifts it could enable them to stay awake for long periods of time
